name: Stephanie Roquet
text: Ordered 2 different pizzas and both were terrible!! The crust didn’t taste like Pizza Hut pan pizza...it tasted like cardboard AND very few ingredients (mostly sauce and crust). Last time for this location.

name: Daniel Stoffel
text: Tried to get delivery around 2pm and had to wait til 4pm for a driver. I said had no problem. Pizza came at around 3:55pm. Very little sauce and very little cheese with average pepperoni. Pizza tasted like dough and pepperoni. Really unsatisfied since I was willing to wait.. smh.

name: Darlia Hatfield
text: We love Pizza  Hut pizzas.  Especially  the pan pizza. They carry soft drinks, Deserts,bread sticks, cheese sticks. Spaghetti and other items. Go check Pizza  Huts List of Food's

name: Jeffrey Coy
text: Best tasting PizzaHut pizza I have had in a while .Delivered  it right to my hotel .

name: Valdyr 92
text: Tasted like frozen pizza from grocery store no where near Dominos

name: Christy McCormick
text: I love pizza huts deep dish pizza

name: Victoria Ward
text: Late on making order.  Food was under cooked and breadsticks were made out of bad dough.

name: Praveen Sriram
text: Came here with my family on trip to WV and the wait was about 30+ mins in the store. Giving 3 stars instead of less than 3 since customer service was excellent and very friendly staff and good tasting pizza. Would give more stars if the …More

name: Darlia Hatfield
text: Pizza Hut has the best pizza in Barboursville. They have mild or hot hot wings and brownies and a chocolate chip cookie also Carry's soft drinks. I love their pan pizzas

name: Kirk Van Hoose
text: A place that they learn who you are.

name: Shawn L
text: Wasnt bad...  just used to better out of pizza Hut...  toppings were a little light.

name: Jack Frost
text: Nasty pizza.  I just got carry out, worse than frozen pizza.  This place needs to be shut down.

name: debbie adler
text: Great fast service with amazing food.

name: Jennifer Runyon
text: Best pizza and wings anywhere.  Staff is great and always on time.

name: Alicia Long
text: Pizza and breadsticks was cold and was over an hour late, due to the delivery driver’s car breaking down ,which I don’t blame them but if you know/knew this and it was way past the delivery time it was to be delivered..should have made a …More

name: Anastasia Fulghum-Reed
text: My family and I visited Barboursville from and ordered the big dinner box at 9pm and we were told we’d get our food at 10:20pm. I figured ok, fine I don’t wanna drive an hour wait is ok. At 10:50 we STILL did not have our food. I called the …More

text: Open late which was much needed at 1130 pm. On Saturday night

text:
Pizzas are always hot and tasty..

Always loved this place as you can see from a previous post but the last two or …More

text: I like grease and if you do too this is for u

name: Julia Midkiff
text: Usually have messed up orders from here, and toppings are sparse even when paying extra for additional. Pizza hut as a whole has come down really far, and food isnt as good. Usually really friendly staff working however and wait times are decent. Storefront is always clean.

name: Ivory Stevens
text: The toppings were good and tasted good but the crust looked good but tasted as if it wasn't cooked all the way

name: Jeff Hesson
text: Great alfredo cheese lovers pizza were hooked

name: J Shep
text: Great portions and sauce distributed!

name: Cindy Staley
text: Food was ready when they said it was due. Great service! Love the online ordering.

name: sharon roach
text: Love the pizza an bread sticks

name: Theresa Decker
text: Placed an order tonight online. Was given a time of 35-45 mins for delivery. Watch an entire movie and started another one....no pizza! Someone isn't doing their job! Either the General Manager doesn't have enough delivery drivers employed or scheduled for the volume of customers or the shift manager isn't editing the times apporitily.

text: Great pizza.  friendly people

text: If peeps only knew behind the scenes stuff you wouldn’t go here at all ignorance is bliss

text: It was good, not the quality it used to be, but worth the money...

text: I ordered 1 supreme and 1 cheese pizza today and both were really good especially the surpeme.

text: Sometimes there fries are good but not always.

name: Andrew Pack
text: Much improved. Fair deals. Good delivery time.

name: Mary Holbrook
text: No better than frozen pizza from the grocery store.

name: J B
text: Our pizza was BURNT and over priced.  Called and explained the burnt issue, asked to speak with manager and they hung up on me.  We will NEVER GO back.  This place is TERRIBLE.  The only reason they got 1 star is because 0 is not an option we can choose.

name: Kalek S
text: I went 3 times which is my standard before posting a review. All 3 times I was greeted with friendly staff and good food.

name: Dennis Casey
text: Staff failed to mention in taking order that drink choice wasn't available.

name: Gregory Flora
text: Ok

text: Pizza is always right and delivered fast. It's pick up or delivery only.

text: Ive always have good experience and the pizza's were always good

name: Frazier McCoy
text: I called 4 times and they never answered. I decided to get my order somewhere else. I MIGT order at this once again. Doubt it.
